alert.note: Alert for Coastal Broward County; Metro Broward County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 10:58AM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A gusty shower will impact portions of northern Broward County through 1130 AM EDT... At 1058 AM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a gusty shower capable of producing a funnel cloud over Sea Ranch Lakes, or over Lauderdale-By-The-Sea, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds and winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Lauderdale, Pompano Beach, Deerfield Beach, Lighthouse Point, Lauderdale-By-The-Sea, Hillsboro Beach, Sea Ranch Lakes, Pompano Beach Airport and Terra Mar. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: This activity was also developing in an environment favorable for the formation of funnel clouds. Stay tuned to NOAA weather radio and local media for additional updates and possible warnings.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Broward County; Metro Broward County
